documentation.text: @notice Computes and returns the round number of drand to request randomness from.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Request ID does not match the last request."

arguments.value: Request ID does not match the last request.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Request ID does not match the last request."

devdoc.details: This contract can be inherit by upgradeable smart contracts as well.This contract handles domain separation between consecutive randomness requests The contract has to be implemented by contracts willing to use the gelato VRF system. This base contract enhances the GelatoVRFConsumer by introducing request IDs and ensuring unique random values. for different request IDs by hashing them with the random number provided by drand. For security considerations, refer to the Gelato documentation.

params.data: Additional data associated with the request.

params.dataWithRound: Additional data provided by Gelato VRF containing request details.
params.randomness: The random number generated by Gelato VRF.

devdoc.title: GelatoVRFConsumerBase

RequestedRandomness(uint256,bytes).notice: Event emitted when a randomness request is made.

fulfillRandomness(uint256,bytes).notice: Callback function used by Gelato VRF to return the random number. The randomness is derived by hashing the provided randomness with the request ID.

devdoc.details: Interface for consuming random number provided by Drand.

params.data: Additional data associated with the request.

fulfillRandomness(uint256,bytes).details: The random number is fetched from one among many drand endpoints and passed back to this function like in a Gelato Web3 Function.

params.data: Additional data provided by Gelato VRF or the user, typically unused.
params.randomness: The random number generated by drand.

devdoc.title: IGelatoVRFConsumer

fulfillRandomness(uint256,bytes).notice: Callback function used by Gelato to return the random number.

userdoc.notice: This interface allows contracts to receive a random number provided by Gelato VRF.

params.data: Additional data associated with the request.

params.dataWithRound: Additional data provided by Gelato VRF containing request details.
params.randomness: The random number generated by Gelato VRF.
